Is there Cross Play in Baldur's Gate 3?

As of Patch 9, Direct Connection works between Steam and GOG on PC & Mac.

Will there be split-screen in Baldur's Gate 3?

Split screen is available in Baldur's Gate 3 (not available in Early Access).
